text: Umar Ata Bandial (born 17 September 1958) is a Pakistani jurist who has been a Justice of the Supreme Court of Pakistan since 17 June 2014. Justice Atta Muhammad Bandial will become chief justice for one year, six months and 25 days from 2 February 2022 till 16 September 2023. Bandial received his bachelor's degree in economics from Columbia University in 1979 and received his law degree from the University of Cambridge in 1981. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Justices of the Supreme Court of Pakistan Category:Pakistani judges Category:Aitchison College alumni Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:Chief Justices of the Lahore High Court Category:Columbia College (New York) alumni
title: Umar Ata Bandial
